column4: How can I mount my partitions running the installation cd interface to backup my files?
try gparted
you can rightclick and mount the shown partitions there easily
what's that?
basically that program is for making your partitions
but you can also mount there
but I have to install it?
try System Administration GNOME partition editor
it is already there
!alien  | Shoeb
!alien  | ShowTime
sry
where's the System Administration GNOME partition editor
click in the PANEL on System, Administration, there should be an entry called GNOME Partition editor
!botsnack | ShowTime
good botty
are you still here?
yes sorry I was in another channel
were you able to find gparted?
I have that GParted open, and I see my partitions, what next?
I have that GParted open, and I see my partitions, what next?
hmmmmmmmm one time is ok. ok?? right click the partition you want to mount, and click mount. in the top right corner you can select the hdd
Sorry. I don't have that option (mount)
